Administration.text:
Type:
Dosage Forms:
Routes of Administration: IV
Common Trade Names: Ammunol

Hyperammonemia.text:
<20kg: 250mg/kg in D10 over 90min; then 250mg/kg/d infusion
>20kg: 5.5g/m2 over 90-120min

<20kg: 250mg/kg in D10 over 90min; then 250mg/kg/d infusion
>20kg: 5.5g/m2 over 90-120min

Renal_Dosing.text:
Adult: Monitor closely
Pediatric: Monitor closely

Hepatic_Dosing.text:
Adult: caution with use
Pediatric: caution with use

Serious.text:
Hypokalemia
Fluid overload
Tissue damage with extravasation from peripheral IV
Neurotoxicity, seizure, coma
Hyperventilation with metabolic acidosis (similar to salicylate toxicity)

Common.text: Vomiting, hyperglycemia, hypokalemia, convulsions, and mental impairment.
